title: New Health and Wellness Seminar Announced
summary: We are excited to announce a new seminar focused on preventative care and wellness, scheduled for this August. Join us to learn more about proactive health management.

title: Dr. T.Monyai Medical Expands Telemedicine Services
summary: To better serve our patients, we have expanded our telemedicine services. You can now schedule virtual consultations for a wider range of non-emergency medical needs.

title: Our Clinic Receives Top Patient Care Award
summary: We are honored to have received the 2024 award for excellence in patient care. We thank our dedicated staff and wonderful patients for making this possible.
